name: Atlantis Executive Spa Suite
description: The Executive Spa Suite is designed for groups who want to entertain in style. A full separate sitting area features floor-to-ceiling windows framing stunning city or Sierra Nevada mountain views. The in-room jetted Jacuzzi tub, premium Bose audio, and butler-level Concierge Lounge access make this one of Atlantis's most complete packages. The suite connects to the Penthouse Parlor for extended group configurations. Ideal for golf trip leaders who want a base of operations — comfortable, private, and impressive.
shortDescription: Full sitting area, in-room Jacuzzi, mountain views, and Concierge Lounge — ideal for group trip organizers.

faqs.question: Can the Executive Spa Suite connect to other rooms?
faqs.answer: Yes. The Executive Spa Suite connects to the Penthouse Parlor, making it possible to configure a multi-room setup for larger golf groups or corporate parties.

testimonials.quote: This is now our favorite Reno hotel. Spacious, well-appointed, and the staff provides service that makes you feel at home. Perfect for a group trip.
testimonials.author: TripAdvisor Traveler

meta.title: Atlantis Executive Spa Suite – Group-Ready Luxury in Reno | Golf The High Sierra
meta.description: Atlantis Executive Spa Suite — full sitting area, in-room Jacuzzi, Concierge Lounge access, and panoramic Sierra Nevada views. Ideal for golf group organizers.
